TopicTitle: [AAR] Project Icarus - The age of invention - Work in Progress

Articles.Content:
So, At the Ninja Space Program HQ...

After so much failed tests of rockets to try to get to minmus, Or even the mun.

The Ninja Space Program thought they coulden't do it. Until, The age of invention struck.

Chapter One: The Dock

Gene: *Turns on TV* Hmm, Wonder what this is all about.

News: Today rocket scientist wernher von kerman, Of the Kerbal Community Colledge, Developes the first rocket propulsion Engine, The LVT-30!

Gene: Hmm, LVT-30 Eh?

News: Here's wernher Von kerman To explain what the LVT-30's all about!

Wernher: The LVT-30 Engine is a relatively fast rocket with basic thrust. I think this engine would be capable to take kerbal to the mun, Or even minmus. Maybe even Duna!

Gene: *Pauses the TV* An LVT-30 Engine... I've got an idea.

1-2 Hours Later...

Gene: *Calls The Director of Ninja Space Program* Sir, We may have struck onto something. Meet me at the old boat docks down by that old airfield.Director: Alright, Can i have a tiny clue of what this something is?

Gene: Just wait and see.

At the Docks...

Gene: See that rocket? *Hands director Binoculars*

Director: Yeah, What?Gene: Wernher Von Kerman Invented the LVT-30 Engine. He says it can take kerbal to the mun.Director: Okay, Get his number and tell him we'll pay him to use his engine.

Gene: Got it.

The Next Day...

Gene: Hello, Wernher this is Ninja Space Program. We'll pay for your engines.

Wernher: Pay? How much?

Gene: Meet us at the Ninja Space Center's Meeting Area.

Wernher: Us?

Gene: Yes, Me and the director. Now get over there.

At the meeting:

Gene: So, Wernher. Can we see your engines in action?

Wernher: Yes, Here's a recorded video.

Gene + Director: *Watches Video*

Gene: Magnificant.

Director: I agree, So how much do you think you'd take to give us your engines?

Wernher: Nothing.

Gene: What?

Director: WHAAT?

Wernher: I said nothing. Space exploration can't be priced. I also wanted to join the Ninja Space Program!

Director: Well, I don't know about joining. Here i'll have you plan the Munar 11 Mission, If we succeed, Your on.

If we don't, Your not.

Wernher: Sounds Fair Enough.

At the VAB's Planning Room:

Gene: Okay wernher, Got a plan for us yet? We're ready to build just waiting for your Go.

Wernher: Okay, Just a few more minutes.

Gene: You've been saying that for hours now.

Wernher: Do you want to go to the mun or not?

Gene: *Grumbled Sigh of Ignorance*

Wernher: Okay.... And Done!

Gene: Finally. May i see it?

Wernher: Sure.

Gene: *Looks at it strangely* Looks good, But what do you call this?

Wernher: Project Icarus.

Chapter 2: The Fall

Gene: Alright we ready?

Wernher: For what?

Gene: To start building.

Wernher: Yes, But do we have enough space in the VAB?

Gene: Of course- Half of the rocket's i've built barely even touch the 2nd Floor.

Wernher: Alrighty then.

At the test launch:

Gene: Confident?

Wernher: Why should i be?

Gene: Well, We don't know if this'll even work or not.

Wernher: I know it will.

Wernher: You'll make it work.

Gene: *Looks strangely at him* Yeah, I will.

Wernher: So, How long you've been building rockets?

Gene: As long as how old kerbin is.

Wernher: Wow, Really?

Gene: Yep, Noone better than me.

Wernher: Then that means we'll go to the mun!

Gene: It does.Mission Control: 3...2...1 We have ignition!Wernher: Yes!

Gene: Yes!Loudspeaker: Gene and Wernher to Directors Office!Gene: Wonder what that's about.

Wernher: Let's find out.

At the Directors office

Director: Gene, Wernher.

Gene + Wernher: Yes?

Director: You did it.

Gene: *We did it*

Director: Yes yes. We're going to the mun.

Gene: Yes!

Director: But...

Gene: But??

Wernher: But??

Director: We're going on a small budget, The fall. The Kerbal Government won't support us anymore than what they have now.

Gene: That's crazy.

Wernher: That's almost Suicide!

Director: If we do this... We will be the best space program ever. And not shuned!

Wernher: Fine. But if we have kerbals stranded, WE'RE RESCUING THEM.

Wernher: I didn't make this plan to have the three kerbals never come home to kerbin.

Gene: I seccond with wernher, This is crazy but possible.

Director: Alright alright Alright. Calm down. Go get ready for the launch in a few weeks.

Later today i'll have a chapter three probably written.

Edited April 4, 2014 by Bearsh
